solution_line_template: Out of the 150 students, {total_percentage}% - {girls_percentage}% = {boys_percentage}% are boys.
Out of the {num_boys} boys, {num_boys} x {fraction_joined_clubs} = <<{num_boys}*{fraction_joined_clubs}={boys_joined_clubs}>>{boys_joined_clubs} joined varsity clubs.
Therefore, {num_boys} - {boys_joined_clubs} = <<{num_boys}-{boys_joined_clubs}={boys_not_joined_clubs}>>{boys_not_joined_clubs} boys did not join varsity clubs.
